Name: Middle Age Conquest
About the game: Demo Is Available / In The Middle Ages You Started As A Small Town, You Will Defeat Your Opponents, Increase Your Lands And Become A Part Of This Adventure That Extends To A Glorious Kingdom By Developing. Choose From 8 Different Flags, You Can Improve Your Town With The Benefits You Want And You May Be The Country Where Other Kingdoms Fear. In Turn-Based Battles, If You Use Your Team and Use Your Units in the Most Effective Way, You Can Create Fear In The Hearts Of The Kingdoms You Are Fighting. Remember, Victory Is Always In The Hands Of The Best And The Right Decision Makers.
